Skiing.Name: Skiing
Skiing.Description: Cold weather sucks, but barreling down mountains is fun.

VideoEditing.Name: Video Editing
VideoEditing.Description: It's so much fun to tell stories through videos and they help hold onto good memories.

Gaming.Name: Gaming
Gaming.Description: Less and less games appeal to me as I grow older, but it's always fun to play with friends.

Dog.Name: Dog
Dog.Description: Dogs are my favourite kind of pets, they are great pals.
